section.title: Features added and issues fixed in version 4.1.2

listitem.para:
JBDS-1985: Synchronization of the virtual database took 30 minutes, compared to 2 minutes in JBoss Developer Studio 4.1.0. This issue has been corrected by undertaking the following modifications:
Adding a utility class that gets the preview and database version from the manifest without loading the entire virtual database.
Creating a simplified model project set.
Re-validation of non-virtual database models within the VdbModelEntry class has been removed.
A timestamp check has been added for model index files, ensuring models are not unnecessarily rebuilt when added to the virtual database.
A check has been added within the virtual database editor that warns a user when they are syncing a model that is currently open in another editor with unsaved changes.
